com.sun.darkstar.example.snowman.interfaces
Interface IController

All Known Implementing Classes:
CharacterController, Controller, SnowballController, SnowmanController
public interface IController

IController defines the interface for all types of entity controller in the system which follows the MVC (Model View Controller) design pattern.

IController defines the controlling unit of a dynamic entity which can be controlled by user inputs. It is responsible for mapping user inputs to the entity and view it controls.

IController generates corresponding ITask when a user input is received to modify the entity and it controls.

IController is updated by the main game update/render loop every frame to perform potential continuous actions. It maintains a reference to the IEntity it controls.

Version:

Yi Wang (Neakor)
